post.author: 김동원
post.content:
CouchDB
Version: 1.0.1
DB Data: Semi-structured, document oriented data (Schema-free)
DB Change/Upgrade: Flexible and easy  
DB Distribution: A peer based distributed database system
Access Language: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) API
Data Type: strings, numbers, dates, ordered lists and associative maps
Indexing: Documents are indexed in b-trees by their name (DocID) and a Sequence ID.
Updating: being serialized
Reading: using a Multi-Version Concurrency Control (MVCC) model, no locking out
post.title: CouchDB
